item.title: I am serving as an Area Chair for ICML 2026
item.description: From ICML: We invite you to serve as an area chair (AC) for ICML 2026 based on your expertise in important sub-areas of machine learning and your prior experience in the peer review process. We sincerely hope you will accept this invitation and help us make ICML 2026 a success.

item.title: Our abstract is selected as a Proffered Paper by ESTRO 2024!
item.description:

Detailed information:

  • Track: Physics
  • Location: Hall 3
  • Session: Symposium - The art of morphing: Advancements and challenges in deformable image registration for radiotherapy
  • Date: 4 May 2024, 09:41-09:50
